entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Rosetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:27 a.m. CST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Fog. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 2:17 AM CST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Fog dissipating. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating in the morning then mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 2:17 AM CST Wednesday 5 April 2023
